no_process_env.why: Prevents environment variable leaks and improves security
no_process_env.eslintMessage: Use import { env } from "@/config" instead of direct process.env access

no_deep_imports.why: Maintains clean dependency graph and easier refactoring
no_deep_imports.eslintMessage: Use barrel imports (@/components/ui/atoms, @/components/ui/components/ui/components/ui/molecules/info-panel, @/organisms) instead of deep paths

design_tokens_only.why: Consistent theming and dark mode support
design_tokens_only.enforcement: Use CSS custom properties and variants
design_tokens_only.eslintMessage: Use design tokens and variants instead of raw CSS values

tenant_isolation_first.why: Prevent SQL injection and validate query safety
tenant_isolation_first.enforcement: All queries must use parameterized statements
tenant_isolation_first.eslintMessage: Ensure query safety - all database queries must be parameterized
